item.title: ALLEGRO MICROSYSTEMS INC 10-K
item.description: ALLEGRO MICROSYSTEMS INC, which is in the Semiconductors & Related Devices [3674] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 19, 2021 had 51828 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
